alert.note: Alert for Attala; Carroll; Choctaw; Holmes; Montgomery; Oktibbeha; Webster; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 9:33PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CHOCTAW...NORTHEASTERN HOLMES... SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL...SOUTHWESTERN OKTIBBEHA...NORTHERN ATTALA... CENTRAL WINSTON...SOUTHWESTERN WEBSTER AND SOUTHERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM CDT... At 933 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Malmaison to Reform. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ackerman, Vaiden, Sturgis, Chester, Coila, and Poplar Creek around 940 PM CDT. Weir and French Camp around 945 PM CDT. Emory around 950 PM CDT. West and Mccool around 955 PM CDT. Louisville, Hesterville, Mcmillan, and Bowling Green around 1000 PM CDT. Ethel, Millcreek, and Possumneck around 1005 PM CDT. Kosciusko and Durant around 1010 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central, north central and northeastern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Carroll; Choctaw; Holmes; Montgomery; Oktibbeha; Webster; Winston
